org.hazelwire.gui
Class Mod

java.lang.Object
  org.hazelwire.gui.Mod

public class Mod
extends java.lang.Object

This class is the GUI's representation for a module. A module consists of a name, and int id, a list of Tags, a list of Challenges, a list of packages and a list of Options.

Constructor Summary

          Constructs an instance of Mod by instantiating all lists and saving the given name.

Constructor Detail

Mod

public Mod(java.lang.String name)
Constructs an instance of Mod by instantiating all lists and saving the given name. Names must be unique, since Mod comparison is carried out based on name.

Parameters:
name - String name.

equals

public boolean equals(java.lang.Object o)
This method overrides the standard equals method, in order to be able to search a Collection of Mods. It checks whether both Objects are instances of Mod and if that is the case, it compares their names.

Overrides:
equals in class java.lang.Object
Parameters:
o - Object that is compared to this Mod.
